keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Orders Support for Luffy
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard commands his entire crew and allied forces to clear a path for Luffy to reach the execution platform.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's unity and tactical coordination under Whitebeard's leadership, focusing all efforts on supporting Luffy's rescue attempt.

keyMoments.title: New World Captains Battle Vice Admirals
keyMoments.description: The New World pirate captains allied with Whitebeard engage the Marine Vice Admirals in coordinated combat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the strength and coordination of Whitebeard's allied forces in the battle.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a white mustache similar to Whitebeard's, crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Inazuma Emerges to Aid in Battle
keyMoments.description: Inazuma, a Revolutionary Army officer, emerges from hiding in Ivankov's hair to participate in the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Revolutionary Army's active involvement in the Marineford War to support Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Inazuma Uses Choki Choki no Mi
keyMoments.description: Inazuma demonstrates the Revolutionary Army's resourcefulness by using their Devil Fruit powers to create a strategic bridge.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights the Revolutionary Army's tactical support and unique abilities in assisting Luffy.
